title: Informational Bulletin: OSS CVEs fixed in PAN-OS

problem.value: The Palo Alto Networks Product Security Assurance team has evaluated the following open source software (OSS) CVEs as they relate to PAN-OS. While it was not determined that these CVEs have any significant impact on PAN-OS, they have been fixed out of an abundance of caution.

solution.value: No software updates are required at this time.
